candidates.name: What are Cloudflare Workers?
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Learn the fundamentals of serverless functions at the edge. Understand how Workers differ from traditional serverless platforms.

candidates.name: API Token Security
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : AES-256-CBC encrypted storage with automatic prompting

candidates.name: Dummy Key Prevention
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Blocks deployment of development/test keys to production

candidates.name: URL Security
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Enforces HTTPS in production, blocks localhost in live environments

candidates.name: JWT Validation
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Ensures proper JWT secret strength and configuration

candidates.name: Runtime Discovery
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Services automatically discover and configure themselves

candidates.name: Feature Flags
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Declarative feature management with domain-specific overrides

candidates.name: Schema Caching
candidates.acceptedAnswer: : Database schema caching for improved performance
